name: Welldiver
description:
Entry for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam.
Theme was Deeper and Deeper.

Test your reflexes and dive deep in to the oceans in our new auto-runner *Welldiver*! Play it on the web and compare your highscorses to your friends and other players on the *Leaderboard*!

## Gameplay

Dodge obstacles, dash to safety, collect oxygen to survive! In Welldiver, skill, reflexes and fast decisions are the key to survival. You traverse the *procedurally generated world* evading danger after danger. 

All graphics, effects, sound and music created within 72 hours by a team of 4 for Ludum Dare 48.

Engine: Godot
